name: Data Analyst
description:
Job responsibilities

  1. Business & Market data processing and analyzing
  2. Definition of IT strategy and project management.
  3. Introduction of new & useful data analyzing tools & methods
  4. Managing the launch of new functions and services
  5. Managing & Improving current company systems
  6. Reports, presentations and business documents preparation
  7. Other data related operations

Professional and technical skills

  1. Higher education
  2. Experience in the Data analyst field for at least 3 years
  3. Experience with various data analysis tools

Competencies and personal qualities

  1. English (spoken/written) – B2 and above
  2. Project management and report preparation
  3. Proactive attitude
  4. Attentiveness
  5. Promptness
  6. Business communication skills
  7. Responsibility
  8. Stress resistance
